name: Esoheerie Beta Version
description:
This game is still in alpha! No contents about this game shall be made public unless specific permission was given! Release date is not final! Consult our official discord server for more info and to enter the Beta-Program <a href="https://discord.gg/FNjw8dR78F" target="_blank">Discord Server</a>

Esoheerie is a creepy psychological horror game. You play as Claire, a mother of 2 children (twins), one of which died during a birthday party. Claire is now haunted by the evil spirit of the child and has to uncover a mystery. Adventure through Claire's house to discover the reason of this evil spirit!

Join the Discord Server to be able to play the game. Game is restricted to Beta-Testers only! Add this game to your collection to stay up-to-date with the state of Esoheerie Recommended Specs: CPU : AMD Ryzen 5 3600X + or similar GPU : NVIDIA GTX 1660 Ti + or similar RAM : 16 GB + Controls: Walk : AWSD Interact (Open/Close doors and pick-up objects) : E or Left Cick Turn On/Off Flashlight : Right Click Cycle Through Flashlight Intensities : T

Ambient Sound:

reds · Esoheerie Background Sound 2
